definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: usu. iron, steel (origin dub.; steel in Ar. is fuwla0d-un, fa0luwd-, but Vulg. Ar. buwla0d; Syr. pwld (in Lexx); loan-wd. fr. Pers. puwla0d acc. to Lag:Ges. Abh. 75, cf. Nö:ZMG xxx(1876), 769, but uncertain, cf. Now and reff.);—pl. [abs.!] [[בְּאֵשׁ־פְּלָדׂת]] [[הָרֶכֶב]] Na 2:4 < ´[[כָּאֵשׁ פִּלְדׂת וגו]] We Now, like fire the steel(fittings) of the chariots.
